name: The Gravest Of Circumstances
Lore: '''The Naboo system has been invaded by the droid armies of the Trade Federation.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. If no senator here, you may place a senator here from hand to add 3 to a battle destiny just drawn. If a taxation agenda here, during your turn may place any one card from hand on Used Pile; opponent must use 1 Force or lose 1 Force.',
